```{r}
       column(4, selectInput('sppsel', 'Select species:', choices = c('Halodule', 'Thalassia'))),
       column(4, selectInput('sitsel', 'Select site:', choices = seq(1:10))),

)
```

```{r reactives}
plodat <- reactive({
  
  # inputs
  sppsel <- input$sppsel
  sitsel <- input$sitsel
  varsel <- input$varsel
  
  toplo <- form_trndat(trndat)
  out <- show_compplot(toplo, sitsel, sppsel, varsel, base_size = 14)
  
  return(out)
  
})
```

```{r}
output$plo <- renderPlot(plodat())
plotOutput('plo')
```
